name: Fishing Party In The Riviera
description: Spend half a day on the sparkling blue waters of Playa del Carmen in the Riviera Maya of Mexico, reeling in sport fish from marlin to sailfish to dorado to wahoo.  These shared fishing trips are perfect for singles or couples on a budget.  There are up to 6 people to a boat, including you.  You will take turns reeling in fish that hit the lines, and possibly landing that great catch you've been hoping for!
